replies.bodyText:
That's the default value in Ratis. If we want to increase this value, we may hit other thresholds.
For example, FLUSH_SIZE_MAX property should also be increased. ENTRY_SIZE_MAX defines the single journal entry allowed, FLUSH_SIZE_MAX one define the total concurrent journal entry size allowed. Other thresholds are unknown. But i agree that we probably should enlarge the default value of these two properties together
replies.author: LuQQiu

replies.bodyText: Enlarge the value of both properties, it should not have downside in normal cases. If we figure out any downside, i would move the value back
